description:
Kawafuji decides to introduce Handa to his friend, but as usual, Handa`s knack for misinterpretation turns the entire situation on its head.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et l`ami de son ami
Handa-kun and His Friend`s Friend / Handa-kun and Dash Higashino / Handa-kun and Palmistry
Handa-kun to Tomodachi no Tomodachi / Handa-kun to Dash Higashino / Handa-kun to Tesou Uranai
半田くんと友達の友達 / 半田くんとダッシュ東野 / 半田くんと手相占い
